item.title: Post: Something new to color
item.description: Roughly four hours of bedtime drawing over the last few days. The challenge of a brain that has to timeshare hobbies. But hey, I remembered to leave the linework layer alone this time. You can color your own if you want! 2020-12-15-linework.jpg image/jpeg 1050 pixels wide, 1050 pixels high Licensed under Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
item.content:encoded:
Roughly four hours of bedtime drawing over the last few days. The challenge of a brain that has to timeshare hobbies.

But hey, I remembered to leave the linework layer alone this time. You can color your own if you want!

  • 2020-12-15-linework.jpg
  • image/jpeg
  • 1050 pixels wide, 1050 pixels high
  • Licensed under Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
